location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Letter and Enclosures to HM Secretary of State for India, dated 20 December 1871.The Enclosures contain correspondence from John Kirk, Acting Political Agent and Consul, Zanzibar (dated August-September 1871), concerning events in Zanzibar, including: a description of a raid that resulted in disaster for the Arab colony of the interior at Unyayembe [Unyanyembe]; references to Henry Morton Stanly [Stanley] and Dr David Livingstone; and a report on the financial position of the Sultan of Zanzibar (Syud Burgash [Saiyid Barghash]) and his likely successors.The Enclosures are dated 31 October-10 November 1871.
